title: Structure situated outside the original plot but included fully or partly within the final plot allotted to a person in the TP Scheme
clause_text: Structure situated outside the original plot but included fully or partly within the final plot allotted to a person in the TP Scheme.
section: 33(12).Redevelopment of contravening structures included in the Final Plot of a Town Planning (TP) Scheme and Removal and re- accommodation of tolerated structures falling in the alignment of road:
